attributes.action: Stop the ban on vapes and nicotine pouches
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this because it will be very beneficial to the economy as it will be bringing lots of money into the country
attributes.background: I want the government to stop the ban on disposable vapes and nicotine pouches

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Don't ban disposable vapes - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654417
